Name: Zohra Sehgal
Desc: Sahibzadi Zohra Begum Mumtaz-ullah Khan, better known as Zohra Sehgal, was born into a Sunni Muslim Rohilla Pathan family of Rampur, Uttar Pradesh, on 27th April, 1912 in Rampur, Uttar Pradesh, India. Name: Zarina Wahab
Desc: Zarina Wahab is an actress, known for My Name Is Khan (2010), Gharaonda (1977) and I, Me aur Main (2013). She has been married to Aditya Pancholi since 1986. They have two children.
